about_the_game:
Sensorium Galaxy is an advanced metaverse composed of interconnected virtual worlds. It is currently the only global, multi-user virtual reality platform focusing on immersive experiences centered around art and cutting-edge musical performances.

Venture into the pulsating heart of Sensorium Galaxy, PRISM, where Carl Cox takes on a hyper-realistic avatar form, performing on a levitating, transformative stage of this anomaly ever-evolving virtual location. Alongside music fans from every corner of the globe, you’ll dive into the fusion of electronic beats and cutting-edge visuals that are set to redefine virtual events.

Advanced technologies like VR, AI, Unreal Engine 5, and motion capture, combined with Sensorium’s unique innovations, have been seamlessly blended to create the ultimate digital incarnation of Carl, delivering the most technologically advanced and visually charged show of our time.

Become part of the Sensorium Galaxy early adopter community and share your feedback to guide the development as we aim to improve.
Sensorium Galaxy is a cross-platform application available in PC and PCVR modes.

Features:

  • FIRST LOOK: next-generation Social VR Experience in the making.
  • ENTER PRISM: explore the hyper-futuristic atmosphere of the electronic music world — the first in the Sensorium Galaxy metaverse.
  • СARL COX’S VIRTUAL DEBUT: witness Carl’s avatar transforming PRISM with his pulsating tech-house rhythms. From volcanic eruptions to colossal extraterrestrial concert structures, every beat brings this realm into a harmonically consonant movement.
  • FASHION FOR THE METAVERSE AGE: unique line of avatars with looks to rule the dancefloor.
  • CHOOSE YOUR STYLE: pick the look from the preset avatar skins. More customization options are coming soon.
  • FEEL THE CONNECTION: full body avatar system makes sure your movements appear natural and enables lipsync when you speak.
  • MEET VIRTUAL BEINGS: strike up a conversation with AI-driven companions.
  • VR CONTROLS REDEFINED: experience VR movement in a new immersive way.
detailed_description:
Sensorium Galaxy is an advanced metaverse composed of interconnected virtual worlds. It is currently the only global, multi-user virtual reality platform focusing on immersive experiences centered around art and cutting-edge musical performances.

Venture into the pulsating heart of Sensorium Galaxy, PRISM, where Carl Cox takes on a hyper-realistic avatar form, performing on a levitating, transformative stage of this anomaly ever-evolving virtual location. Alongside music fans from every corner of the globe, you’ll dive into the fusion of electronic beats and cutting-edge visuals that are set to redefine virtual events.

Advanced technologies like VR, AI, Unreal Engine 5, and motion capture, combined with Sensorium’s unique innovations, have been seamlessly blended to create the ultimate digital incarnation of Carl, delivering the most technologically advanced and visually charged show of our time.

Become part of the Sensorium Galaxy early adopter community and share your feedback to guide the development as we aim to improve.
Sensorium Galaxy is a cross-platform application available in PC and PCVR modes.

Features:

  • FIRST LOOK: next-generation Social VR Experience in the making.
  • ENTER PRISM: explore the hyper-futuristic atmosphere of the electronic music world — the first in the Sensorium Galaxy metaverse.
  • СARL COX’S VIRTUAL DEBUT: witness Carl’s avatar transforming PRISM with his pulsating tech-house rhythms. From volcanic eruptions to colossal extraterrestrial concert structures, every beat brings this realm into a harmonically consonant movement.
  • FASHION FOR THE METAVERSE AGE: unique line of avatars with looks to rule the dancefloor.
  • CHOOSE YOUR STYLE: pick the look from the preset avatar skins. More customization options are coming soon.
  • FEEL THE CONNECTION: full body avatar system makes sure your movements appear natural and enables lipsync when you speak.
  • MEET VIRTUAL BEINGS: strike up a conversation with AI-driven companions.
  • VR CONTROLS REDEFINED: experience VR movement in a new immersive way.

name: Sensorium Galaxy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX™ 2070 / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements for Desktop mode.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen™ 7 3800XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX™ 3080 / AMD Radeon™ RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements for PCVR mode.

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Sensorium Galaxy invites you to experience the uncharted realms of PRISM. Immerse yourself in a revolutionary 30-minute set featuring tracks written, crafted and produced exclusively by Carl Cox for ‘Intermundium,’ his debut virtual show.
